column4: Does anyone here know why Windows 7 would have acceptable Wifi Perfornmance, but Ubuntu would have terrible (but technically functional) performance?
ok... but they are running on the same hardware, shouldn't they have the same throughput with the3 wireless card?
Windows 7 has a lot more proprietary and non-free drivers installed by default, Linux does not.
do sudo lshw -C |grep network and let's see what card you have
